name: Ocean Ring
description: An elegant sterling silver ring inspired by the calm movement of ocean waves. Designed for everyday wear with a subtle gemstone accent.

aboutMaterials.925SterlingSilver: All silver pieces are made with 925 sterling silver, Aura's signature material and the industry standard in the United States and most world markets. Made of 92.5% pure silver, it’s a highly durable material ideal for daily, long-term wear.
aboutMaterials.10KSolidGold: All gold pieces are made with 10K Solid Gold. It's more durable and scratch-resistant than 14k solid gold, making it ideal for everyday wear.
aboutMaterials.GoldVermeil: Crafted with 92% recycled sterling silver and a thick gold layer, combines sustainability, durability, and style. Tarnish-resistant and hypoallergenic, it’s perfect for everyday wear, offering the look of gold at an affordable price.
aboutMaterials.Gemstones: We use an array of high-quality, precious and semi-precious gemstones selected for their beauty and longevity.
